function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exploitative rental practices by landlords","Impact":"Renter's homeownership ambitions are negatively influenced","Mitigation":"Enforce regulations on landlord rental practices","Technologies":"Regulatory systems for rental market oversight","People":"Renters","Owner":"Government and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Social inequality in the housing market","Impact":"Fueling economic and political instability, impacting housing opportunities","Mitigation":"Reform policies to address housing inequality","Technologies":"Policy reform, housing market analysis tools","People":"General population, policymakers","Owner":"Government, policymakers"},{"Description":"Contagious disease transmission in the housing market","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to housing conditions","Mitigation":"Implement public health measures in housing, improve housing conditions","Technologies":"Public health surveillance, housing infrastructure improvements","People":"Residents, property owners","Owner":"Health authorities, property owners"}]}
